text: Two Tickets for a Daytime Picture Show () is a 1966 Soviet crime movie directed by Gerbert Rappaport.История СССР в избранных кинофильмахДВА БИЛЕТА НА ДНЕВНОЙ СЕАНС It stars Aleksandr Zbruyev, Zemfira Tsakhilova, and Igor Gorbachyov. == Actors == * Aleksandr Zbruyev as Alyoshin * Zemfira Tsakhilova as Tonya * Igor Gorbachyov as Nikolayev * Pyotr Gorin as Shondysh * Aleksey Kozhevnikov as Andreyev * Nikita Podgorny as Lebedyansky == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1966 movies
title: Two Tickets for a Daytime Picture Show
